text.p: National Prosperity - (built 1995) 75,100 dwt 13.8 on 34 plus 2.2 del Hong Kong ppt five to seven months trading $12,350 daily Yukong.
Far East Victory - (built 1994) 70,003 dwt 14 on 32.5 plus 2 del USG 7-15/4 trip Far East $15,000 daily plus approx. $295,000 bb EMC.
TBN - 72,500 dwt 13 on 35 plus 2 del Far East 5-10/4 trip two or three laden legs redel Atlantic approx. $7,750 daily for 1st 50 days $10,500 for the balance Docenave.
Oinoussian Legend - (built 1997) 71,700 dwt 14 on 30 plus 2 del Pusan retroactive 28/3 trip Nopac r/v approx. $12,750 daily Halla.
Yu Long Shan - (built 1980) 64,400 dwt del Plate 10-20/4 trip Singapore-Japan range $12,500 daily plus $300,000 bb Finagrain (reported).
Avra - (built 1982) 64,800 dwt 13 on 42 plus 3.5 del USG 10-20/4 trip Taiwan $13,550 daily plus $255,000 bb Cho Yang.
Athena - (built 1979) 61,500 dwt 13 on 35 plus 3 del Cape Passero retroactive 24/3 trip via ECSA redel Colombo-Aden range $13,000 daily Tradigrain (ammended).
Anangel Express - (built 1982) 61,537 dwt 13.5 on 35 plus 2 del Taiwan early April trip New South Wales r/v $11,000 daily U Ming.
World Utility - (built 1983) 47,828 dwt 14 on 34 plus 2 del Celebes ppt trip via India redel Japan $9,000 daily Daiichi.
Iolcos Legend - (built 1980) 35,295 dwt 13 on 30 plus 2 del Stettin 5-6/4 trip USG $6,750 daily Combac.
